value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I see something!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Ah, some fresh faces. Good. I was
growing bored.$k$pThose who shrink from the flames...
Those who, when confronted by true
power, have no choice but to bow...$k$pListen to me now. I am Surtr. I am
your king.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|King Surtr of Múspell, I am Prince
Alfonse of Askr. Explain to me...what
gives you the right to do this?$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Heh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|It's no joke.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Tepid...and dull. Save your words. A
true ruler seizes other lands. He puts
their people to the flame.$k$pThere is only one king. There is only
one kingdom. All else will burn.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Is that your answer? Well, then. We
have but one possible reply...$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|I see. You intend to fight. Very well.$k$pChildren of Askr, the ones who open
the way... I hear you rely on the power
you borrow from other realms.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Fascinating! We will see what
remains: you, or the fires of Múspell!$k$p$EFace|Laevatein!$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|Sir.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|By your side.$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|It's time for the slaughter! Ha-hah!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_04,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|We're not making a dent in Surtr's
defenses...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Is it Embla's Ward again? If so...we'll
just wait for our chance and strike
when its power fades.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face_Anger|This is King Surtr's power.$k$pThe flames are undying,
unquenchable... No Hero, no weapon
can defeat him.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Undying, unquenchable flames... Just
like the book of prophecy says.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If that's true...what are we supposed
to do?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Our only recourse is retreat. Let's go,
$Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_スルト,ch00_07_Surtr_M_Normal,Face|Watch them flee! As tepid as before,
these weaklings...$k$pHiding is useless. This entire realm
will crackle with my flames...$k$pYou and your people, Askr... Flayed
by my flames, living torches.$k$pNifl took me six months. The one
before that...three. How long can
Askr last?$k$p$EFace_Smile|It's time we find out! Ha-hah!$k$p$Sbs150|
